Method Detail

createBrandCaptchaHtml

java.lang.String createBrandCaptchaHtml(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                                        java.util.Properties options)
Creates HTML output with embedded brandcaptcha. The string response should be output on a HTML page (eg. inside a JSP).

Parameters:
errorMessage - An errormessage to display in the captcha, null if none.
options - Options for rendering, tabindex and theme are currently supported by brandcaptcha. You can put any options here though, and they will be added to the BrandCaptchaOptions javascript array.
Returns:

createBrandCaptchaHtml

java.lang.String createBrandCaptchaHtml(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                                        java.lang.String theme,
                                        java.lang.Integer tabindex)
Creates HTML output with embedded brandcaptcha. The string response should be output on a HTML page (eg. inside a JSP).

Parameters:
errorMessage - The error message to show in the brandcaptcha ouput
theme - The theme to use for the brandcaptcha output (null if default)
tabindex - The tabindex to use for the brandcaptcha element (null if default)
Returns:

checkAnswer

BrandCaptchaResponse checkAnswer(java.lang.String remoteAddr,
                                 java.lang.String challenge,
                                 java.lang.String response)
Validates a BrandCaptcha challenge and response.

Parameters:
remoteAddr - The address of the user, eg. request.getRemoteAddr()
challenge - The challenge from the BrandCaptcha form, this is usually request.getParameter("brandcaptcha_challenge_field") in your code.
response - The response from the BrandCaptcha form, this is usually request.getParameter("brandcaptcha_response_field") in your code.
Returns:
